content: भंगुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भंज्-घुरच्] {@--1@} Apt to break, fragile, brittle. {@--2@} Frail, transitory, transient, perishable; आमरणांताः प्रणयाः कोपास्तत्क्षणभंगुराः <ls>H. 1. 188</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 72.</ls> {@--3@} Changeful, variable. {@--4@} Crooked, bent. {@--5@} Curved, curled; शशिमुखि तव भाति भंगुरभ्रूः <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--6@} Fraudulent, dishonest, crafty. --रः The bend of a river.
